sourcesContent:
<script setup>
import { ref, onMounted } from 'vue';
import eventbus from '@/eventbus/eventbus';

const showFilterButton = ref(false);

// 버튼 상태 업데이트 핸들러 등록
const toggleFilterButton = () => {
  showFilterButton.value = !showFilterButton.value; // 상태 반전
};

onMounted(() => {
  eventbus.SearchResultEvent.add('toggleFilterButton', toggleFilterButton);
});

</script>

<template>
  <button v-if="showFilterButton" class="btn filterBtn">필터</button>
</template>



<style scoped>
  .filterBtn{
    background-color: white;
    border-radius: 20px;
    width: 70px;
    border: 1px solid #b4c7dd;
  }
</style>
